channel.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
channel.description:
Well i need help with this 508 server, i want to make a new home, and i have a perfect area but i cant go there because its underground.. when i tele to it with Height 0 it just bugs my account, and i tried it with heigh level -1 but it also buggs my account, but its easily accesible with a ladder, but it doesnt work, does anybody know how to make the ladder work?
Thanks, Maxie35.

item.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

ow... ty =P i also only have x and y. now also height. thx you verry mutch!

Don’t mention it Glad you got it working.

Nvm i got it to work lol, above the ladder = height lvl 0.

item.source: [508] How to go down a ladder?

item.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
item.dc:creator: @sarranoob sarranoob
item.description:
@sarranoob wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:5, topic:276351”]Right, time for some helping, since this question isn’t completely noobish (first time I’ve ever really seen a non-noobish question on these forums :o)

Go into Commands.java and find “coords”. You should see something like the following:

                } else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p, "X: " + p.absX + ", Y: " + p.absY + ".");

at the end of the sendMessage, add this:

H: " + p.heightLevel + ".");

That’s the height level on ::coords, compile and run. Though I know where you mean and that’s height level 0.

If you don’t have mapdata for the cave then it will crash your client, if you knew where it is anyway :S[/quote]
ow… ty =P i also only have x and y. now also height. thx you verry mutch!

Read full topic
item.source: [508] How to go down a ladder?

item.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Right, time for some helping, since this question isn’t completely noobish (first time I’ve ever really seen a non-noobish question on these forums :o)

Go into Commands.java and find “coords”. You should see something like the following:

                } else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                    p.frames.sendMessage(p, "X: " + p.absX + ", Y: " + p.absY + ".");

at the end of the sendMessage, add this:

H: " + p.heightLevel + ".");

That’s the height level on ::coords, compile and run. Though I know where you mean and that’s height level 0.

If you don’t have mapdata for the cave then it will crash your client, if you knew where it is anyway :S

Read full topic
item.source: [508] How to go down a ladder?

item.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
item.dc:creator: @Maxie35 Maxie35
item.description:
@Maxie35 wrote:

This are the coords: x=2827 y=9808 ive tried teleporting there with both height lvl 0 and height lvl -1.

If you want to know which place it is, in Catherby, at the fishing area there is an island, if you down down that ladder on that island, you will be very near to my place.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2009, 08:28:32 am[/size][hr][quote=“King Lingerz, post:3, topic:276351”]Do ::coords and check your height level. If your on 0 then I doubt you’ll be able to get there.
(Underground places are way out in the areas with nothing but black)

If however, you CAN get there, it’s ObjectOption1 you’re looking for, and if you don’t know how to add it in there people will flame the life out of you.[/quote]

i dont get height lvl when i type ::Coords , only X and Y

Read full topic
item.source: [508] How to go down a ladder?

item.title: [508] How to go down a ladder?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Do ::coords and check your height level. If your on 0 then I doubt you’ll be able to get there.
(Underground places are way out in the areas with nothing but black)

If however, you CAN get there, it’s ObjectOption1 you’re looking for, and if you don’t know how to add it in there people will flame the life out of you.

Read full topic
